title: Social Media Manager & Video Editor (Health & Fitness Focus)
job_overview:
Role: Video Editor & Social Media Manager (Part-Time or Project-Based)
Industry: Holistic Health, Fitness, and Lifestyle
Commitment: Ongoing (7 videos/week)
Location: Remote
Pay: Competitive, based on experience and output

About Me
I run a brand called Haplete (Happy Athlete) that empowers people to live healthier, happier, more adventurous lives. My content mixes fitness, holistic health, nutrition, lifestyle and spiritual connection.

I'm committed to posting 1 reel per day for the next year, and I need a creative, reliable partner to help bring my content to life.

What You’ll Be Doing
- Take raw video clips (filmed on phone) and edit them into highly engaging, emotionally-resonant reels (15–60 sec)
- Add storytelling elements: text overlays, pacing, transitions, color grading, and music
- Select royalty-free or trending sounds where appropriate
- Repurpose content for Instagram, TikTok, and YouTube Shorts
- Assist with scheduling, caption writing, and basic analytics tracking

 Ideal Candidate
- Has experience editing for fitness, wellness, or lifestyle creators
- Understands storytelling and emotional beats not just flashy transitions
- Proficient in CapCut (IDEAL), Adobe Premiere, or similar mobile-friendly editing tools
- Can work quickly (24–72 hr turnaround max)
- Has a feel for aesthetic, minimalist, natural vibes (not overdone or gimmicky)
- Is passionate about health, personal growth, movement, or spirituality

Bonus if you:
- Are familiar with Instagram/TikTok algorithms
- Can help brainstorm hooks and video concepts
- Enjoy working with creators on meaningful missions

 To Apply, send me:
- 2–3 short-form videos you've edited for a creator or brand Upgrade to see actual info
- A short note on why this work excites you
- Your rates (per video or per batch)

Bonuses will be given for hitting certain milestones (virality, page growth).
